title: Implement pane focus management and visual indicators
description:
Implement focus state management:

FocusedPane enum:
- PaneStatus (not typically focusable, or limited focus)
- PaneTasks
- PaneOutput

Focus cycling (Tab key):
PaneTasks -> PaneOutput -> PaneTasks

Visual focus indicators:
- Focused pane: blue border (#89DCEB)
- Unfocused pane: gray border (#6C7086)
- Focused pane header: bold
- Update border styles dynamically in render functions

Focus affects:
- Which pane receives j/k navigation
- Border color highlighting
- Header styling

Helper functions:
- isFocused(pane FocusedPane) bool
- focusBorderStyle() lipgloss.Style - returns appropriate border color
- focusHeaderStyle() lipgloss.Style - returns appropriate header style
closed_reason: Added focus management helpers: isFocused(pane) bool, focusBorderColor(pane) returning lipgloss.Color (#89DCEB blue for focused, #6C7086 gray for unfocused), focusHeaderStyle(pane) returning bold style for focused pane. Refactored renderTaskPane and renderOutputPane to use these helpers for consistent focus-aware border colors and header styles. Tab cycling between Status->Tasks->Output->Status was already implemented. tui package compiles independently.
